name: Phys.OS
description:
Welcome to the wonderful world of computing! 

PhysOS is the latest in operating system technology, offering a wide variety of features to aid in your day to day work activities, such as:

  • A secure username based log in system, that lets you keep your files private and away from prying eyes.
  • Easy to use file navigation including all new Folders, which can store files for you!
  • A wide variety of supported file formats, such as text (.txt), images(.jpeg) and more!
  • PhysOS also now comes with Internet technology allowing users to quickly and easily recieve and send digital mail! It's as easy as throwing it up to the clouds and it will fly the rest of the way to it's destination, all by itself.

So what are you waiting for? make sure to ask for PhysOS the next time you visit your local computer or electronics store.
